mapper.insert: INSERT INTO secondhand_reply (secondhand_board_no, secondhand_reply_content, secondhand_reply_writer) VALUES (#{secondhandBoardNo}, #{secondhandReplyContent}, ${secondhandReplyWriter})
mapper.select: SELECT A.secondhand_reply_no, A.secondhand_reply_content, A.secondhand_reply_writer, A.secondhand_reply_date, B.secondhand_board_no FROM feed_reply A, feed B WHERE A.secondhand_board_no = B.secondhand_board_no ORDER BY secondhand_reply_no LIMIT #{p.pageStart}, #{p.amount}
SELECT secondhand_reply_no, secondhand_reply_content, secondhand_reply_writer, secondhand_reply_date, secondhand_board_no FROM secondhand_reply WHERE secondhand_reply_no = #{secondhandReplyNo}
